section.title: sign function
section.para: Returns the sign of the argument.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: The sign function returns the sign of z. z may be any numeric expression that evaluates to a real number. The function is undefined when z has an imaginary part. sign(z) returns 1 for z>0 and -1 for z<0. sign(z) is undefiend for z=0.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: u(z) is commonly known as the unit step function. z may be any numeric expression that evaluates to a real number. The function is undefined when z has an imaginary part. u(z) returns 1 for z≥0 and 0 for z<0.
